title: Swept-parameter-induced postponements and noise on the Hopf bifurcation.
abstract: The postponement of Hopf bifurcations driven by a swept bifurcation parameter is demonstrated with an electronic Brusselator. Noise on the swept parameter destroys the postponement and the bifurcation as it is usually defined
